entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 11:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: N 45 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
